===Interactables===
====Unfinished Musical Score====
Located next to [[Local Legend]]: Rilai.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:(A seemingly incomplete musical composition is stuck within the notebook. The following is written below...)
:To think you'd compose such a melody... Even my own pales in comparison...
:I hope you can finish it soon &mdash; and send me a copy once you do!
:I'll practice in advance. That way, we'll have two songs we can play together next time we meet!
{{Dialogue End}}

====Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I)====
Located northeast of the Tezcatepetonco Range [[Statue of The Seven]].
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before lifting the Pale Mist)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' Within the colorless realm... It seems the words upon it cannot be read...

;(After lifting the Pale Mist)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' (A stone tablet eroded by the passage of the long years. The writing is now blurred, the patches that remain now islands of clarity amid a blurry sea...)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' ...Ever since the [[Sacred Flame]] cleansed the [[Abyss|pitch-black foe]], the remaining embers... floating like clouds.
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' [[Ochkanatlan]]... canyon in the sea, afterwards, covered by the flowing ashes...
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' Destroying all colors, even the licking tendrils of flame cannot be lit here.
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (I):''' Not even the High Priests of the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] could deal with the disaster that is the purging of color...
{{Dialogue End}}

====Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II)====
Located west of [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]].
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before lifting the Pale Mist)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II):''' (...)

;(After lifting the Pale Mist)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II):''' (A stone tablet eroded by the passage of the long years. The writing is now blurred, the patches that remain now islands of clarity amid a blurry sea...)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II):''' ...By day, the sages in white engraved golden inscriptions like glowing rings upon the stone dragon.
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II):''' “You must pay your respects to this stone dragon, venerating it daily, only then can...” 
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (II):''' Hereafter... The priests so executed their duties, and Cinder City was never again covered by the remaining ash...
{{Dialogue End}}

====Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (III)====
Located in the cave above the [[Trial of Disembodiment]] at the southwest of the Tezcatepetonco Range.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (III):''' (A stone tablet eroded by the passage of the long years. The writing is now blurred, the patches that remain now islands of clarity amid a blurry sea...)
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (III):''' "But take heed and remember this well! Never be careless... The secret arts of the stone dragon still... a blessing."
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (III):''' "The ash has not been completely removed from Cinder City, and be cautious of the... within..."
:'''Stone Tablet Amidst Gray Ash (III):''' "Do not forget... The admonishments and guidance of the [[Yohualtecuhtin, Lord of the Night|Lord of the Night Realm]]..."
{{Dialogue End}}
